recap_documents.description: OPINION AND ORDER: I order as follows: 1. I DENY on the merits Amended Petition [314) Claims l(A)(l), l(A)(2)(e)-(g),l(A)(3), l(A)(4), l(B)(l), l(C)(2)(a)-(d), l(D)(3)(a)-(g), l(D)(4), l(E)(5); Claim 2;Claims 3(A)(l), 3(A)(2), 3(D)(l), 3(D)(4)(a)-(f), 3(D)(5); Claims 4(A), 4(B)(l)(a)(c), 4(c); Claims 6(A)(l), 6(A)(2); Claims 7(A)(l)-(6), 7(B); Claim 8; Claim 9;Claims lO(A)-(D); Claims 1l(A),1 l(C)-(E); Claims 12(1)-(12); Claims 13(4)-(10);Claims 14(A)(l)-(3), 14(B)(l)-(3), 14(C)-(E); Claims 15(A)(l)-(5), 15(B)-(E);Claims 16(1)-(6), 16(7)(a)-(e), 16(8) & (9); Claim 20 and Claim 21; 2. I DENY Claims 18 and 19 without prejudice as premature;3. Respondent shall file, within sixty (60) days of the date of this Opinion and Order, a brief addressing the exhaustion, procedural default and any exceptions toprocedural defaultpe1iainingto Claims l(A)(2)(a)-( d), l(A)(5)(a)-( d), 1 (B)(2)(a)-( e ),l(C)(l), l(C)(3)(a)-(d), l(C)(4), l(D)(l)(a)-(d), l(D)(2), l(E)(l)(a)-(k), l(E)(2)(a) & (b ), 1 (E)(3), l(E)( 4), l(E)(6), 1 (F)(l)(a)-(c); Claims 3(A)(3)(a)-(r), 3(B)(l )(a)-(z),3(C)(l)(a)-(m), 3(D)(2), 3(D)(3)(a)-(c), 3(D)(6); Claim 5; Claims 6(B)-(E); Claim lO(E); Claim 1 l(B); Claims 13(1)-(3); Claim 16(7)(f); and Claim 17. Petitioner shall file a response within 60 days of the filing of respondent's brief. Respondent shall file a reply within 30 days of the filing of petitioner's response and petitioner shall file a sur-reply, if any, within 30 days of the filing of respondent's reply; and 4. Due to the subsequent filing of the Amended Petition, I DENY as moot Motion 299 . I will resolve the issues of procedural default, exhaustion andexceptions to procedural default pertaining to the remaining Amended Petition claims as necessary in my examination and resolution of these claims after a final round ofbriefing from the parties. (See 138 page opinion for more information) Signed on 8/9/18 by Judge Robert E. Jones. (dsg) (Entered: 08/13/2018)
